page.title: 15HOUSING IN TARRANT VALLEY
page.content: On our exploration of our block large areas had no houses at all,other areas just had farm buildings.But where there were groups of houses or villages we noticed three very different types of building materials. The few new houses or bungalows were made of bricks with tiles on their roofs and were just like our house on the estate where I live.The houses that were older were built using bricks with layers of flints in between.These houses had slate tiles on their roofs.The cottages that were the oldest of the buildings we came acros were made of stone with plaster on the outside.What made them look so pretty were their thatched roofs.Some of them had been made modern but they looked ever so small.Some of the thatches were very old.
